meta.name: keywords
meta.content: Jeopardy Archive Stacie Macias John Meyer Liza Taylor Final clue response question answer Daily Double

meta.name: description
meta.content: An archive of clues and players for Jeopardy! show #1174.

td.p: Stacie Macias, a homemaker from Lake Elsinore, California
John Meyer, a songwriter originally from New York City
Liza Taylor, a novelist originally from Washington, D.C. (whose 1-day cash winnings total $2,999)

tr.td: ENGLAND
MOVIE SEQUELS
FURNITURE
SPORTS TRIVIA
REPTILES & AMPHIBIANS
INSERT COIN

div.onmouseout: toggle('clue_FJ', 'clue_FJ_stuck', 'When the "Star-Spangled Banner" was written, this man was president of the U.S.')

tr.td: AMERICANA
When the "Star-Spangled Banner" was written, this man was president of the U.S.
Liza
John
Stacie
2nd place: Trip to Acapulco, Mexico + either the Jeopardy! box game or the Jeopardy! computer game
3rd place: Vita-Vac vacuum by Vita-Mix + either the Jeopardy! box game or the Jeopardy! computer game
New champion: $14,800 + either the Jeopardy! box game or the Jeopardy! computer game
Liza
John
Stacie
